name: 1BVentHood
0:
”Alexa, turn on Hood Lights.”
”Alexa, increase Hood Fan.”
”Alexa, brighten Hood Lights.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the ‘1B Vent Hood’ skill and Alexa, you can now control the lights and fan in your FirstBuild voice-enabled vent hood, handsfree! Be sure to set up your vent hood first before beginning. 

Press ‘Enable Skill’ to link your Amazon account and discover your devices. Find more information about connecting Smart Home devices at http://amzn.to/291lR7u.

When using the skill, you need to specify by name which device in the vent hood to use. Here are two ways you can define these names:
 - Repeat the vent hood setup process to name the lights or fan in the vent hood. If not provided, the default names are ‘Hood Lights’ and ‘Hood Fan.’
 - Create an Alexa group, like ‘Vent Hood’ or ‘Kitchen Hood’, and add both the lights and fan to the group. 
More information is available at http://amzn.to/2965dCE.

Once you know the name or group of your vent hood devices, you can now say the following: “Alexa, turn on Vent Hood” or “Alexa, brighten Hood Lights.”

Visit us at http://bit.ly/1bventhood for FAQs or more info.
